snippet: The Oklahoma City Thunder piled up points at an alarming rate Tuesday night as the Nets tried in vain to match one of the N.B.A.’s most athletic and most electrifying offenses.
abstract: Oklahoma City Thunder defeats Brooklyn Nets, 117-111.
lead_paragraph: The Oklahoma City Thunder piled up points at an alarming rate Tuesday night as the Nets tried in vain to match one of the N.B.A.’s most athletic and most electrifying offenses.

headline.seo: Nets Take a Tough Loss Against the Thunder
headline.main: Nets Chase but Cannot Run Down Thunder
headline.print_headline: Nets Chase but Cannot Run Down Thunder
